Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1981...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1981 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/8/1983 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/1983 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 8/16/1986 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1987, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1989, going 7-0, 1.84...
Injured on 9/29/1989 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/16/1990 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/12/1991 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Cy Young Award in 1991, going 25-3, 2.37 ERA...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 1/31/1994 (Going to HOU: P L. Guetterman. Going to CHC: P B. Colon)...
Released by Houston on 1/31/1994...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/11/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $1,300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/4/1995 to a 3-year deal worth $2,450,000 per year...
Injured on 9/4/1996 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
